description:
<p>We are expanding chest pain outreach services and have exciting opportunities for additional cardiology clinical nurse specialists within the team. There are 3 new posts to support the assessment and management of chest pain and heart failure services throughout the trust. The post holders will also contribute to the work of the cardiology specialist nurse team across both acute sites. We are looking for motivated nurses who could be currently working in a chest pain assessment role or who have cardiology skills and experience looking for a career development opportunity. Candidates should have relevant experience and accredited clinical assessment skills. An independent prescribing qualification is essential for Band 7 posts but we can offer support to the right candidates at Band 6 on an annex 21 training basis with progression to Band 7 on completion.</p>
<p><span>For informal enquiries please contact Paula Dailey Nurse Consultant in Cardiology on 07766468388 or 0191 3332803 or at paula.dailey@nhs.net</span></p>
